modName: Enchant Magic Damage and Potency RUS
summary: Steel can progress to legendary power. Magic stays the same the day you learned the spell from the tome. Good thing you can reduce spell cost by 100% because you needed to cast it 50 times to kill anything.
descriptionHtml:
Russian translation of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14265][b]Enchant Magic Damage and Potency[/b][/url].
All rights and credits to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=911589][color=yellow][b]Cupressi[/b][/color][/url]

This mod adds 5 circlets which you can disenchant to give you the ability to enchant your armor to increase spell damage and potency.
-Alteration: increases spell duration
-Conjuration: increase spell duration
-Destruction: increase spell damage
-Illusion: increase level effectiveness
-Restoration: increase spell potency

[b]Installation:[/b]
This mod is in one .esp file, so... Just drop the .esp to your Data folder.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/readmes/Enchant%20Magic%20Damage%20and%20Potency%20RUS_readme.txt]Russian readme[/url] included. (Press \"View as a .txt\" in Readme section to read it in russian).
author: Cupressi Shadowmann
